post.body: I've never seen it either. I need to watch it someday. But feel like the mood should be right
nice to meet you too. GLad you like the post!! More to come once I emerge from Christmas land
retweeting, soryy, pet peeve o mine
Can't tell. Too embarrassing. Let's say river + call of the wild + unpredictable current = embarrassed parents more than me
that is awesome! Spread the word that the whole world is not falling apart! There ARE jobs.
quit trying to start fights! I am so telling @inprogress
Dunno. Can I come over?
Is this your for really real life? I LOVE it!
thanks, good to know!
how many is best?
yes but how would you pay for her drink once she said yes?
AMEN!! I will also buy great used jeans in absurd sizes rather than a full priced pair in my OWN size.
I mean monetarily. I will spend hours doing/making something I don't want to pay $$ for. But good one.
Re: 2009 predictions. According to several well informed folks that I follow, they are, in a word, bupkis/guesses. Whew, waaay less pressure
ROFL. Jack just arrested his bro QUin for "salting a police officer" HAHAHAHAHA
I am at a loss as to what to "predict" for 2009. How come everyone else is prescient but me? It's so unfair.
I haven't blogged in days. . .DAYS!!!! http://www.marenated.com
You know what irritates me? RTing yourself? What's up with that?
HAH! @kimmance will be live from France tomorrow at 1 (my time CT) http://www.gogalavanting.com/live
yum, fish tacos with jamaican black beans complete with my mom and dad PLUS friends in town Susie, Travis and Jared! W00t!
